t: Be a Broadway Star - Wikipedia
s: January 25, 2023 - Be a Broadway Star was released in 2010 by Broadway producer Ken Davenport. It was named one of Kathie Lee Gifford and Hoda Kotb's "Favorite Things" on NBC's Today in 2011, has appeared in Time Out Kids and the Gleek Guide, and was featured in the New York Times.
